title: Disasters, Inflation & Biden
description: Fellas talk about devastating storms in the heartland, the growing inflation crisis and Biden's inability to help. Former Pentagon official Bridge Colby joins the progrum for an interview.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Josh Holmes, Michael Duncan, Comfortably Smug, Bridge Colby, John Ashbrook)
